评论详情: I am absolutely in love with the this Luxury Pajama Set! This two-piece satin pajama set, complete with a sleeping mask and scrunchie, truly exceeds all my expectations in terms of comfort and style. The material is silky smooth and feels incredibly luxurious against the skin, akin to much more expensive sleepwear brands.  It is true it is to size. The fit is exactly as described, which is a great as it can be hard to find well-fitting sleepwear online. The elastic waistband on the pants ensures a comfortable fit without being too tight, and the top drapes beautifully.  The quality of the fabric and the construction of the pajamas are superb. They've held up wonderfully in the wash without any noticeable wear, pilling, or loss of the silky feel. The included sleeping mask is a charming touch, enhancing the overall sleep experience by blocking out light effectively, while the matching scrunchie is gentle on my hair.  If you’re looking for a set of pajamas that offers a touch of indulgence at a reasonable price point, this SATEEN set is definitely worth considering. It makes me feel pampered and relaxed, perfect for unwinding at the end of the day. Highly recommend for anyone seeking a bit of everyday luxury!

While this is a beautiful pajama set with an included sleep mask, it is not comfortable. The material feels cheap against my skin, it’s not a flattering fit, and I cannot sleep in it. If it was made with a more quality material, this would have been perfect. It’s a beautiful design, but the cheaper material prevents this from making me feel good in it. I got it because it said it was sateen, which usually means a high quality cotton, but this is satin.

Cute, classic cut and styling, fits true to size, love the muted gray-blue color for the summer! Would make a cute gift or perfect for bridesmaids!

The material feels very comfortable and I really like the contrasting white piping-it makes it look gorgeous. I just wish that I sized up.

It's soft and comfortable. I ordered the wrong size. But it's good for night clothes
Everything about this fit is too small, it honestly feels child sized. If you're ordering, I'd get at least 2 sizes above you usual (so if you're a L get XXL) for it to be comfortable sleep wear.

Silky smooth. Soft. Cool to the touch, which is nice for sleeping. My only issue with it is one of the pockets stitching was already coming undone straight out of the package. Other than that, it's great.

The fit is spot-on, true to size and flattering without feeling overly restrictive. The buttons are a nice touch, adding a touch of refined elegance to the overall design. And while the fabric is on the thinner side, it still manages to provide ample warmth and coziness, making it an ideal choice for year-round wear.  One minor drawback is the tendency of the fabric to wrinkle fairly easily. However, this is a small trade-off for the luxurious feel and comfort the pajamas provide. With a quick steam or iron, the wrinkles can be smoothed out effortlessly.  Overall, this luxury pajama set is a wonderful blend of indulgence and practicality.

I ordered these for our daughter, and she loves them. She loves how soft they are. My only complaint is that the collar sits weird, but it is not worth not purchasing them. They also hold up; I have washed them several times and they are still in good condition.

The quality of these is pretty nice, they're satin and there aren't any annoying scenes so it feels great against your skin. This set is so soft! I love how it feels, I’ve been wearing it every week! I love the accessories that it comes with too. The only thing that I wish this set had was more stretch, but other than that it’s the perfect set. Make sure to size up if you’re between sizes. It’s the cutest shade of blue.

Although I am a tall woman who does not do women's lounge pants, I do wear women's lounge shorts, especially when they are satiny soft and silky. It is my favorite pajama set. Feels super comfortable and looks cute on me.

评论概述: This set provides both style and comfort.
评论详情: The Luxury Pajama Set for Women offers elegance and comfort in one package. This 2-piece set comes with a silky satin top and pants, complemented by a matching sleeping mask and scrunchie. Perfect for bridesmaids or any special occasion, these pajamas exude sophistication and luxury. Whether lounging at home or preparing for a night of relaxation, this set provides both style and comfort for a restful sleep experience.

评论概述: Set comes w/ awesome extras: eye mask & scrunchie. Soft and silky and comfy!
评论详情: Okay, so this PJ set is just gorgeous, y'all! It is so soft and silky to the touch and they look so cute! I got them in the white and they would be perfect for getting ready before a wedding or as a bridesmaid gift or for a pajama party or movie marathon/ sleepover with your besties!  I've always been a no-fuss flannel pants and a tank kind of girl, but I've always dreamed of having fancy elegant PJs like these, and now, finally I have my dream PJs at last!  I'm 5'4", 170lbs, bust is 38D, waist is 34.5", shoulder is 16.9" and hip is 44.5". I got this set in the Medium size and it fit me very nicely. Not too fitted or too loose, just perfect. About one size too big on me, just to give yo9u some idea of the sizing, I could have sized down if I wanted it super fitted and tailored, but I like my PJs to have a little more room, they're just plain comfier that way IMHO. These are true to size. Sizing chart is accurate, so be sure to follow it.  The set comes with a few nice little extras: Along with the lapel button down top and shorts you also get a nice silky eye mask and a silky scrunchie. Both the scrunchie and eye mask are made of the same matching material as the PJs.  The fabric feels like it is good quality and it is thick enough to not be see-through at all. The fabric is silky smooth and light and breathable. I got these in white and I was worried that they might be thin and transparent but I'm glad I was wrong. I'm pleased to report that they are NOT see-through all, except maybe if you were outside in very strong sunlight, but for most scenarios you'd be wearing pJs in, these are not at all see-through!  They are lightweight and breathable and super comfy to sleep in. I can't wait to use these this summer!  The shorts have an elastic waist with a drawstring closure. The piping is very nicely done. They wash well and don't lose their silky, almost minky, feel. They don't lose thier softness with repeated washing and they don't wrinkle super easily either, so that's a plus.  Now I want them in every color in the rainbow!  Hope this helps somebody!

I ordered these as a male, since a) they were free through the vine program b) I live in florida and it gets too hot for full length satin pajama sets. These are extremely comfortable, to the point where I have considered ordering more... the only complaint I have is that the sleeve cuffs kinda stick out/turn up a bit at the end, but that is probably because I opted to wear women's pajamas and not that there is a defect with the product itself. If you have thicker arms, you may notice the same thing.

Silky soff, cozy and cute. Very comfortable, after all they're jammies. No indication on the label of the material they're made of, but they feel silky soft. They also wash well. The pictures you see is after they've been worn and washed. I'm a small, but I like a lot of room in my jammies so I've got a medium and I'm happy. I think these are a good value.

The pajama set includes a shirt and a pant, as well as a eye mask and a hair tie. I like the satin material. It is very soft and comfortable.  Generally I wear M size top clothes. I ordered Size M of the pajama. The set is a little big for me, perfect as a pajama.  The only thing I do not like is that there are a lot of threads on the clothes and the eye mask. I expect a higher quality than this. Thus I give a three star review.

This pajama set is super cute! The pajamas themselves are lightweight, breathable, and comfortable. They have a silky, satin feel and are perfect to sleep in. The top even comes with large pockets!! The matching sleeping mask and scrunchy are just the icing on the cake! What you see is what you get; what I received matched the product description photo precisely and left me feeling content that I got what was advertised. With that being said, I would caution against this set if you happen to sweat a lot --the damp fabric will stick to your body more than other material (say, cotton) would. I'd highly recommend this. It's worth every cent.

This is a great little set! The pajamas are very soft and comfortable, and they fit well. My favorite part is actually the sleep mask, though! It doesn't have anything adjustable on the sides poking into you while your head is on the pillow. The whole thing feels very luxurious, at an affordable price! These would make a great gift for bridesmaids, girls trips, etc.
Love to sleep in this luxurious material, it feels so nice

These are nice pajamas and the color is beautiful, just as pictured.  The top has a narrower fit than other pajamas I have purchased in this style so they are not quite as comfortable as others, but they are definitely wearable and look great.

This is a nice set... just not really what I was expecting. It is really soft, but like soft in an odd way. Like not soft and cozy but soft to the touch. And they sleep hot for me... so much so that even though they're shorts and a short sleeve blouse I cannot sleep in them, they stick to my skin before I even get into bed. Turning around in bed is almost uncomfortable because I stick to the bed as I try to turn. And I roast in these things, there's no breathability what-so-ever. I am getting used to the face mask a bit more, but even that is uncomfortable. It soft on my face but the band is too thick, it bothers my ears while I'm laying on my side with it around my head. I had to stretch it out a bit before putting it on after the first time, because it was too snug against my eyes and was almost giving me a headache from the pressure. Now, the reason I gave it four stars instead of less after all these complaints is that they are soft and kind of comfy wearing around as lounge pjs and you could still stay warm and still have the comfort of wearing shorts. The eye mask is also a great size, it covers my eyes fully and sits well once its stretched out good.
Comfortable and cute pajama set. Very silky and smooth against your skin. Not sure about the mask and the scrunchy but if you need one, you are all coordinated.

Bought these for the wife.  She likes the fit and color, but unknown to me she doesn't like the sateen material, but in fairness to the PJ's she's never tried it before. Bought this for the wife, its a nice mauve color, very soft, and fits her well. The inclusion of the hair band and sleep mask are nice too.  This held up great after the first wash; I feel that the initial wash is the best way to weed out things that are total garbage. This seems to be pretty good quality. '  Also it's lightweight and the fabric has a soft hand -- I had ordered another pair of similar pajamas earlier and those felt like sailcloth.  Mother's day is coming up...

My wife was evaluating these for me. She says that there is a baggy feel to the collar/chest area and seems to be cut unusually. Love these silky soft pajamas. These pajamas kept their shape after washing and are really comfortable to wear.

These are so comfy and cute. I love the color! I will say upon the first wash, some thread came lose around the waistband. Idk how they will hold up over time, but for now they are nice!

I love this pajama set!! Its made of beautiful satin material. Very comfortable and fits great. The shorts has an amazing stretch to it. I absolutely love the periwinkle violet color. womens pajamas. sizing is accurate. very comfortable button down pajamas. comes with shirt and shorts, along with a scrunchie and face mask. description is accurate. well made and comfortable to wear

One downside that I hope doesn’t affect the quality, is some fraying, running threads that did not open any holes or expose any openings on the clothes when pulled, but should be noted.  ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️’s

Got this for my 20 year old daughter. She loved it! It is exactly as pictured the color is baby pink and it feels soft to the touch. She already wore it and told me she loves it! Great pjs for people that like this material.

I couldn't be more pleased with my purchase of this luxury pajama set. From its elegant design and true-to-size fit to its unparalleled comfort, it ticks all the boxes for what I look for in sleepwear. The addition of the sleeping mask and scrunchie adds a thoughtful touch, making it the perfect gift for oneself or a loved one. Whether you're looking to indulge in a little self-care or simply elevate your loungewear collection, this pajama set is sure to exceed your expectations.

I got this pj set to treat myself to an at home spa day. It felt so nice after a relaxing bath to slip on this satin pj set. The scrunchy helped keep my hair in one place and the eye mask had a great tension in the band, not too loose or too tight. The stitching was done well and the it fit me great too.
Silk Pajamas are always my go to .. Super comfortable!

I chose the rose pink color in a size medium.  I usually order a medium in pajamas that don't stretch, or a small if they are t-shirt or modal material.  The fit was perfect.  The pockets are very cute.  Instead of having the standard one on the chest, you get one on each side at the bottom of the top.  Love the matching scrunchie as well.  Not sure I'll use the sleeping mask, but it matches and looks cute.  The pink is very flattering on olive skin.  The buttons are a bit tight when trying to close, but the up side of that is that they stay closed!

Edit - 4/04/24: We had a nice warm evening and I was able to wear this finally, for more than just trying it on. Well, I immediately took it off. It DOES give static cling really badly. That was going to be my deal-breaker, and now it is. To the donation pile it immediately went.  Original review - 3/12/24: I didn't have high hopes for this fabric, but it's better than I expected. It's not quite as static-y as polyester satins tend to be, but I also have only worn these when it's been moderately humid, so I'm not sure how these would act in a very arid climate. If they turn out to be horrible during a different season, I'll update my review, but they're soft against my skin and I only got static when I tried the shorts on over cotton leggings. Wearing them as intended they were fine.  I typically take a S top and M bottoms, so I ordered the M and they fit as expected - bottoms are nice and comfortable at my natural waist; top is large and the shoulders hang about 1" off where they should be. (About one size too big, as expected.)  I love the terracotta color, it was as expected/pictured...but maybe I was even pleasantly surprised at how much it hit the target. I've been disappointed more times than I care to recall with clothes purchased here, so it was refreshing.  I hate how this cheaper material doesn't release packing wrinkles. As of 3 washes and line-dries, those are major permawrinkles and there doesn't seem to be much hope of them coming out anytime soon. Steaming only released the wrinkles from the washing, not from the original folding for shipping.  All in all, for under $20 (at time of purchase/review, March 2024), they're an ok little pj set. I was able to purchase these through Vine for a discount, but I could recommend them for maybe bridemaids gifts or something like that - if you took a lot of time to get the wrinkles out.

Ordered a Size large which is my typical size for me - 170 and 5'7". It fits well and looks decent. It is trying to be silk but is not silk so I usually throw in the wash after each wear as it will be wrinkly after wearing it to bed.  Even though it is shorts and a tshirt, the material kept me warm at night.
